meanings.def: used when the woman or girl who performs an action is also affected by it
examples: She must be very proud of herself.

meanings.def: used to emphasize the female subject or object of a sentence
examples: She told me the news herself.
Jane herself was at the meeting.

meanings.def: to be in a normal state of health or happiness
examples: She didn't seem quite herself this morning.
She needed space to be herself.
She runs the business by herself.

meanings.def: for only her to have or use; not shared
examples: She wants a room all to herself.

idioms.def: to be in a normal state of health or happiness
examples: She didn't seem quite herself this morning.
She needed space to be herself.
She runs the business by herself.

idioms.def: for only her to have or use; not shared
examples: She wants a room all to herself.

related: bring out of himself, herself, etc.
bring somebody out of himself, herself, etc.
